themes: exclusion of unknown or unconnected individuals
perceived inequities based on personal connections and identity
lack of opportunities for marginalized or less visible community members
key_phrases: The people no one knows who might like one shot to show what they can do
Many feel they are not welcome to the 'space' that .orgs keep crowded
you have to know someone who can get a word in to the funders
a granted CEO’s daughter would get funding rather than a daughter who has no mother
the fireman’s talent would override the garbage truck operator talents
Maybe a black person over a white person, young vs. old
barriers_identified: lack of access for those without connections
perceived bias based on occupation or identity
